b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout{background:#f4f4f5;padding-top:24px !important;width:95%;max-width:1400px;margin:auto}.bs-area{padding:16px}.bs-area__clearfix{display:block;clear:both}.bs-area__wrapper{background:#fff;padding:1rem;margin:16px;margin-top:0;border:1px solid #e4e4e7;border-radius:.25rem;position:relative}.bs-area .add_widget{border-radius:4px !important}.bs-area .add_widget a{color:#3f3f46 !important;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none}.bs-area .add_widget a:hover{color:#18181b !important}.bs-area .section{overflow:visible !important;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;border:1px solid #e4e4e7 !important;border-radius:4px !important}.bs-area .section>h4{margin-left:0 !important}.bs-area .widget-content{border-radius:4px !important;background:#fff;height:auto !important}.bs-area .widget,.bs-area .widget .widget-wrap1,.bs-area .widget .widget-wrap2,.bs-area .widget .widget-wrap3{border-radius:4px !important}.bs-area .widget.locked-widget,.bs-area .widget .widget-wrap1,.bs-area .widget .widget-wrap2,.bs-area .widget .widget-wrap3{border-radius:0 !important}.bs-area .draggable-widget .widget-wrap3{background:#f4f4f5 url(https://www.gstatic.com/images/icons/material/system/1x/drag_indicator_grey600_24dp.png) no-repeat 9px center !important;padding-left:42px;margin-left:0 !important}.bs-area .visibility .editlink.icon{width:32px !important;height:32px !important;top:12px !important;background:#f4f4f5;padding:4px;background-image:url(https://www.gstatic.com/images/icons/material/system/1x/mode_edit_grey600_24dp.png);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center;border-radius:4px}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area:before{background:#fff;color:#27272a;content:"Area: upper";left:16px;margin-top:-24px;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-weight:700;padding:.25rem .5rem;position:absolute;border-radius:4px 4px 0 0;top:0;border:1px solid #e4e4e7;border-bottom-color:#fff}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section{overflow:hidden !important;padding:0;border:0 !important;margin-bottom:0 !important}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section h4{display:none}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section .widget{width:48.5%;margin-bottom:8px !important;border:1px solid #e4e4e7;overflow:hidden;border-radius:4px !important}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section .layout-widget-state{display:none !important}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section .layout-widget-description{margin-left:0 !important}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section .layout-title{font-weight:700;margin-left:0 !important}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section .widget.Header{float:left}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.upper-area #hder.section .widget.PageList{float:right}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.main-area:before{background:#fff;color:#27272a;content:"Area: main";left:16px;margin-top:-24px;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-weight:700;padding:.25rem .5rem;position:absolute;border-radius:4px 4px 0 0;top:0;border:1px solid #e4e4e7;border-bottom-color:#fff}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.main-area .bs-area__container{overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:8px}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.main-area .bs-area__container .bs-main{width:49%;float:left;margin:16px 0}.bs-area .bs-area__wrapper.main-area .bs-area__container .bs-aside{width:49%;float:right;margin-top:16px;margin-bottom:-16px}

b:with.value: { isLazy: (data:lazy ?: false), w: (data:src.width ?: "100%"), h: (data:src.height ?: "100%"), alt: (data:alt ?: data:messages.image), imgParams: ("-" + data:imageParams), img: resizeImage(data:src, data:imageSize, data:imageRatio), isAImage: contains(data:src, "blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/") }

b:include.name: @image
